It's well-known about scandal around some secret US prisons in Europe for suspected in terrorism. About humiliation scandal in Guantanamo and Abu Greib trumpeted international Mass Media. In this connection Americans decided to close Guantanamo. Well, I think you understand that announcement about is closing isn't mean that CIA stop its activity. At present time Americans have found territory for creation of new prison.
 Well, Americans found perfect place Bosnia and Herzegovina. The fact is that Kosovo is rushing to drop out of it. Americans will help it as Montenegro but than will present with a fait accompli that on its territory new military prison will be built.
 Moreover I know that Bush's administration is going to charge to realize this project to Halliburton which took place in Guantanamo building and other secret prisons in Poland, Rumania, Azerbaijan, Ukraine and Latvia.
